action_title: Build bird-perches to enhance natural seed dispersal
key_messages:
Key Messages:

One replicated, randomized, controlled study in BrazilÂ found that building perches for birds increased species richness and abundance of new tree seedlings.
background_information:
Background information and definitions:
Building perches for birds can be used to enhance seed dispersal and increase species richness and abundance of tree seedlings. This can help to restore tree communities in degraded forest areas.
